item.title: 日本命令谷歌停止强迫手机制造商使用其应用程序
item.description: 就在本周与美国进行高风险贸易谈判之前，日本公平贸易委员会命令 Alphabet Inc.【原文：Japan’s Fair Trade Commission ordered Alphabet Inc.’s Google to stop alleged abuse of its market power over local smartphone manufacturers, just ahead of high-stakes trade negotiations with the US this week.】

item.title: 瑞典公布春季预算刺激低迷经济
item.description: 瑞典宣布了旨在刺激疲软经济的支出计划，因为全球贸易战给这个北欧最大国家的前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Sweden announced spending plans aimed at stimulating the sluggish economy as a global trade war muddies the outlook for the biggest Nordic country.】

item.title: 沙特咖啡连锁店寻找银行家寻求上市机会
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯咖啡连锁店 Barn's 已开始在利雅得进行首次公开募股，以扩大其在中东的业务范围。【原文：Saudi Arabian coffee chain Barn’s has started work on an initial public offering in Riyadh as it seeks to expand its footprint in the Middle East.】

item.title: 香港机场成功发行债券后寻求 26 亿美元贷款
item.description: 香港机场管理局正在寻求约 200 亿港元（26 亿美元）的银团贷款。【原文：The Airport Authority Hong Kong is seeking a syndicated loan of about HK$20 billion ($2.6 billion), people familiar with the matter said, months after completing one of the largest bond offerings by a local issuer.】

item.title: 阿布扎比通过先进的癌症治疗设施深化医疗卫生事业
item.description: 阿布扎比将在中东地区建立一个先进的癌症治疗中心，这标志着阿布扎比在数十亿美元的多元化发展计划中向医疗保健领域的最新进军。【原文：Abu Dhabi is set to build an advanced cancer treatment center in the Middle East, marking its latest foray into the health-care sector as part of a multibillion-dollar diversification push.】

item.title: 四月增税前英国就业人数创大流行病以来最大降幅
item.description: 英国企业在受到 260 亿英镑（约合 343 亿美元）工资税增加和美国关税打击前不久，以自大流行病开始以来最快的速度裁员。【原文：UK businesses shed workers at the fastest pace since the start of the pandemic shortly before they were hit by a £26 billion ($34.3 billion) rise in payroll taxes and US tariffs.】

item.title: 印度股市收复特朗普 4 月 2 日关税引发的跌幅
item.description: 印度股市在长周末后恢复交易时反弹，基准股票指数抹去了本月早些时候美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收对等关税引发的所有损失。【原文：Indian stocks rallied as trading resumed after a long weekend, with the benchmark equity index erasing all the losses triggered by US President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs earlier this month.】

item.title: 台湾航运大亨在香港购买 3400 万美元豪宅
item.description: 一个台湾航运家族以 2.6 亿港元（合 3400 万美元）的价格买下了香港的一栋豪宅，创下了这个亚洲金融中心今年第二大新房销售记录。【原文：A Taiwanese shipping family has bought a luxury mansion in Hong Kong for HK$260 million ($34 million), marking the second-largest new home sale in the Asian financial hub this year.】

item.title: 监管着 1,080 亿美元的中国影子银行面临清算
item.description: 中融国际信托有限公司（Zhongrong International Trust Co., Ltd.）是中国最大的影子银行之一，在其数十亿美元的理财产品违约之前，据熟悉此事的人士称，在其两位国家指定的托管人得出该公司资不抵债的结论之后，该公司正面临清算。【原文：Zhongrong International Trust Co., one of China’s largest shadow banks before it defaulted on billions of dollars of wealth products, is facing liquidation after its two state-appointed custodians concluded the firm is insolvent, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑升破 1.32 美元，英国股市将再次上涨
阳狮集团展望未来，客户赢利抵消经济动荡影响
item.description: 法国广告公司阳狮集团（Publicis Groupe SA）不顾全球经济的不确定性，坚持其对 2025 年收入的预测，这得益于今年年初的强劲表现，赢得了可口可乐公司（Coca-Cola Co.【原文：Publicis Groupe SA, the French advertising company, is sticking to its revenue forecast for 2025 despite global economic uncertainty, buoyed by a strong start to the year with big client wins such as Coca-Cola Co. and Banco Santander SA.】

item.title: 出生率持续走低，日本人口减少 50 万
item.description: 去年，日本人口减少了 50 万，这凸显了日本在解决劳动力短缺问题以及在税基不断缩小的情况下为社会保障体系提供资金方面所面临的日益严峻的挑战。【原文：Japan’s population contracted by half a million last year, underscoring the country’s mounting challenges in tackling labor shortages and financing its social security system with a shrinking tax base.】

item.title: 爱立信业绩超出预期，移动运营商购买更多 5G 设备
item.description: 爱立信公司第一季度盈利超出分析师预期，原因是移动运营商增加了对这家瑞典电信运营商 5G 设备的支出。【原文：Ericsson AB’s earnings beat analysts’ expectations in the first quarter as mobile operators ramped up spending on the Swedish telecom operator’s 5G equipment.】

item.title: 卡塔尔达纳塔拉公司将出资 40 亿美元投资印度尼西亚
item.description: 印度尼西亚达纳塔拉财富基金（Danantara）和卡塔尔已同意共同出资 40 亿美元投资东南亚最大的经济体，这标志着新基金首次计划与外国投资者合作。【原文：Indonesian wealth fund Danantara and Qatar have agreed to pool $4 billion for investments in Southeast Asia’s largest economy, marking the new fund’s first planned venture with foreign investors.】

item.description:

item.title: Lazard 新设阿布扎比办事处，增强中东地区咨询团队实力
item.description: 拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc. ）将在阿布扎比开设办事处，扩大在这个通过主权财富基金控制着约 1.7 万亿美元的城市的业务，并进一步深化其在中东地区的业务。【原文：Lazard Inc. is opening an office in Abu Dhabi, expanding in a city that controls about $1.7 trillion through its sovereign wealth funds and further deepening its presence in the Middle East.】

item.title: 关税威胁市场反弹，新加坡房屋销售降温
item.description: 新加坡 3 月份的新房销售量有所下降，更有早期迹象表明，蓬勃发展的住宅市场正在失去动力。【原文：Singapore’s new home sales fell in March, adding to early signs that the booming residential market is losing steam.】

item.title: 科技界的 "僵尸独角兽 "走到了尽头
item.description:
关税动荡让泡沫时代的初创企业面临财政纪律问题。这不是坏事。【原文：

Tariff turmoil puts fiscal discipline on the table for bubble-era startups. That’s no bad thing.   

】

item.title: Stellantis 投资者对前首席执行官支付 2,310 万欧元感到愤怒
item.description: Stellantis NV 的投资者正在反击这家汽车制造商的薪酬做法，该公司前首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）在销售和盈利下降的一年里获得了 2,310 万欧元（2,620 万美元）的薪酬。【原文：Stellantis NV investors are pushing back against the automaker’s remuneration practices that awarded former Chief Executive Officer Carlos Tavares €23.1 million ($26.2 million) for a year of declining sales and earnings.】

item.title: 台湾利率掉期折让创纪录 兑现宽松承诺
item.description: 台湾的短期利率掉期与当地货币市场基准的贴水幅度最大，这加深了美国关税促使岛内对货币宽松政策下更大赌注的异常现象。【原文：Taiwan’s short-term interest rate swaps are at the widest discount to the local money market benchmark, deepening an anomaly as US tariffs prompted stronger bets on monetary easing on the island.】

item.title: 在关税影响下，日本超长收益率溢价为 2002 年以来最宽
item.description: 由于全球动荡和财政问题导致超长收益率上升，投资者要求持有日本 30 年期国债的溢价已扩大到 20 多年来的最高水平，超过 5 年期国债。【原文：The premium that investors demand to hold Japan’s 30-year government bonds over five-year notes has widened to the most in over two decades as global volatility and fiscal concerns drive up super-long yields.】

item.title: 瑞银下调中国 2025 年经济增长预测
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS AG）在一系列下调中国经济增长评级的声明中，又一次做出了主要银行中最悲观的预测，预计由于美国关税抑制出口，中国经济今年将仅增长 3.4%。【原文：UBS AG added to a series of growth downgrades for China with the most pessimistic forecast among major banks, predicting the economy will expand just 3.4% this year as US tariffs choke exports.】

item.title: 政策不确定性导致国债定期溢价跃升至十年新高
item.description: 由于担心特朗普政府不可预测的关税政策会削弱投资者对美国政府债券的信心，持有 10 年期国债的风险溢价已攀升至十年来的最高点。【原文：The risk premium to hold 10-year Treasuries has climbed to the highest in a decade on concern the Trump administration’s unpredictable tariff policy will sap investor confidence in US government bonds.】

item.title: 关税延长亚洲交易低迷期，韩国企业推迟债券销售
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策导致市场剧烈波动，韩国公司正推迟美元债券销售，这加剧了中国以外亚洲新交易的枯竭。【原文：South Korean companies are delaying dollar bond sales as President Donald Trump’s tariff policies cause wild swings in markets, exacerbating a dry spell in new Asian deals outside of China.】

item.title: 耶伦称特朗普关税政策有误导性，并警告存在不确定性
item.description: 前财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）说，唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的理由 "不明确，而且完全不合情理"，她还补充说，她相信中国希望 "缓和这场冲突"。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said the rationale for President Donald Trump’s tariff policies was “unclear and not at all sensible,” adding she believes China would like to “de-escalate this conflict.”】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 建筑商融创寻求将所有海外债券转换为股票
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国建筑商融创中国控股有限公司（Sunac China Holdings Ltd.）正在与一些主要债权人商讨将其所有离岸债券转换为股权的计划，因为该公司在持续的流动性问题下正着手进行第二次债务重组。【原文：Chinese builder Sunac China Holdings Ltd. is discussing with some major creditors a plan to convert all of its offshore bonds into equity, according to people familiar with the matter, as it embarks on a second debt restructuring amid persistent liquidity problems.】
